div.h3: Updates from PC Alum & Nashville Recording Artist – Josh Gallagher

div.p: Our physical offices are closed. However, our administrative team continues to work remotely.

p.strong: All administrators will be available Monday through Friday from 9:00 am-3:00 pm to answer emails and phone calls. With the increase in phone calls and emails please be patient in the response times between these hours. Emails and phone calls will be answered within 48 hours.

div.p: The Contact Us link will allow community members to contact us via email.

A list of primary administrative contacts is below for your easy reference.
Jeanette Black – General Questions
Kaitlyn Kalwanaski – High School Principal
Dane Harrold – Middle School Principal
Joseph Smorto – Elementary Principal
Carrie Conrad – Director of Special Education
The Penn Cambria School District will prepare productive citizens in a safe and positive environment that promotes excellence in academics, the arts and athletics.
Copyright © 2018 Penn Cambria School District. All Rights Reserved.

div.div: Physical Buildings & Offices Closed – Please See Remote Learning Plan and Contact Information on Website
